bio: He studied in Texas and loves all things American, but his Southern accent still isn't great.

soultimate.name: Yes We Pelican!
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases ally Attack by 15%, Defense by 105%, movement speed by 12% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies' stats are boosted for a time.

skill.effect: Spd ↑ when attacked, 1.6% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: Hit and Run

name: Apelican
